item.title: Alice Smith
item.description: Alice leads the lab and has extensive experience in cryo-EM and structural virology. Her research focuses on understanding virus structure and developing new methods for cryo-EM data analysis.

item.title: Bob Johnson
item.description: Bob is a Postdoctoral Researcher focusing on analyzing cryo-EM data and refining structural models. He is particularly interested in developing new algorithms for image processing and 3D reconstruction. Bob enjoys hiking and exploring national parks in his free time.

item.title: Carol Williams
item.description: Carol is a graduate student investigating the conformational dynamics of viral proteins.

item.title: David Brown
item.description: David helps with sample preparation and data acquisition.

item.title: Image Processing
item.description: Steps for processing cryo-EM images. Import micrographs into RELION. Perform motion correction. Estimate CTF parameters. Pick particles and generate initial model.

item.title: Sample Preparation
item.description: This protocol describes the steps for preparing cryo-EM samples. Grow cells to mid-log phase. Harvest and wash with buffer. Apply sample to grids and plunge freeze.
